title: WeatherApp
description: Weather App is an application that shows the weather forecast based on your current location. This app was an activity proposal and was built with Monaca (Cordova)

title: URL shortener
description: The interesting part of this project is the backend, which was done using TypeScript and the Redis database.

title: Rule of three
description: Three rule application with a nice interface. Made with React Native.

title: App Basal Metabolic Rate (TMB)
description: This app has a nice interface and a good user experience. Made with Monaca
